mapper.insert: INSERT INTO funding(funding_code, id, start_date, exp_date, status_code) VALUES(null, #{id}, NOW(), NOW(), 10);
mapper.select: SELECT f.funding_code, id, title, start_date, exp_date, target_amount, cml_amount, introduction, code, name, size, location FROM funding f LEFT OUTER JOIN funding_main_image mi ON f.funding_code = mi.funding_code WHERE status_code = 40 ORDER BY funding_code DESC
